PAD_URL = #{padUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAD_NUMBER = #{padNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAD_DESCRIPTION = #{padDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PAD_ID = #{padId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_ROBOT_PAD set PAD_URL = #{padUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAD_NUMBER = #{padNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAD_DESCRIPTION = #{padDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PAD_ID = #{padId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:

select
from SYS_ROBOT_PAD ORDER BY PAD_NUMBER DESC LIMIT 1
